launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.CRITICAL.022 \ JNLP_SECRET=2b6248e762b2abe176ed787fabe07e8158d8bb6e76d280502f58739f69c6294c \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_SALLOC_ACCOUNT=misc_ci \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-small.sh
